a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Foreign aid given to least-developed countries as a share of donor's
Net official development assistance (ODA), divided by donor's gross national income.
Data source: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
Note: The United Nations' target is for developed countries to devote 0.15% - 0.2% of their national income to ODA to the poorest
